Department: Yong Siew Toh Conservatory Of Music
ModuleDescription: Interdisciplinary collaboration involving electronics is common in today's art world. This module offers an introduction to some of the artistic issues in this field as well as some of its practioners. In addition to readings and class discussion, professional artists from different disciplines (music, dance, visual art, multimedia, theatre) visit to share their knowledge, experiences, and aesthetic approaches in their works.
